## FunctionInputNode.validate() method

Validates the node state

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected validate(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

Empty string (always valid)

## Remarks

Function input nodes have no validation requirements as they have no inputs and their type is explicitly set.
